message:
I apologize in advance for the prolonged post.
I need a fast track (Framework, IDE, methodology ) for developing mobile apps (geared towards prototyping) that satisfies the following :
1-  The conceived prototype should be easy to implement and is not meant to be sold or commercially consumed as is. Performance and optimization are non factors really.
2-It must be possible to build the final product using all or most of at least the business logic and the frontend. 
3-Scaleability is a must.
4-Must be very very flexible
5-Cloud ready. 
I think you have an idea of what I'm looking for. But here is the fun part. The suggested stack is meant to be used by a small team of web developers who are familiar .Net framework but willing to invest time and effort in something else BUT with minimum time/effort 
Thank you  .

data.message: Ionic HTML5 Mobile Framework is that what u looking for ?
You can start with Xamarin Forms, then do the customization for the target platform.
First do it, then do it right and then do it better. You are complicating your project

Use native and use cloud services from the start, it's easier to get Java developers than any other developers, you can even use koltin or Scala or groovy. 
Start with quality in mind and you will never suffer
